name: snahp.it Dark Mode
additional_info:
Version 1.0.4
2020-09-11
Tested on Firefox.
Changelog:
- Themed a new kind of infobox.
- Themed search bar.
- Resized selectors for featured links to be more clickable.


Version 1.0.3
2019-01-04
Tested on Chrome and Firefox.
Changelog:
- Fixed some text getting darker on hover instead of getting lighter.
